image.caption: A burro I passed while taking a strole on the Isla de Sol.
View from hilltop of the Sacred Valley of the Incas.
Famous lost city of the Incas in Peru.
View of Copacabana and Lake Titicaca shoreline, taken from Our Lady of Copacabana hilltop.
Pushing my camera's macro-setting to the limits with a butterfly I found in the rainforest of Iguazu.
Waterfall and river that divides Paraguay, Brazil and Argentina.
Rockwall seperating sheep herds on Inis Oirr, the smallest of the three Aran Islands off the west coast of Ireland.
A rusting shipwreck I stumbled across on Inis Oirr.
Historic plaza in Buenos Aires, Argentia, La Playa de Mayo.
Just in time to see Big Ben, London, England.
No precautions are taken lightly at docks in Ireland.
Postcard perfect photograph of the Vatican.
Years of touch has softened the iron of St. Peter's statue in St. Pete's Basilica..
Vigorious climb to the crest of this mountain to photograph El Calafate and the Andes in the horizon.
Mass celebrated at sunrise on the top of Skinner's Butte in Eugene, OR.
St. Peter's Square and fountain illuminated.
Fellow traveler enjoying the sights and weather in London.
